pull_request.title: Bump amphp/http from 1.6.3 to 1.7.3
pull_request.body:
Bumps [amphp/http](https://github.com/amphp/http) from 1.6.3 to 1.7.3.
Release notes

Sourced from amphp/http's releases.

1.7.3

What's Changed

  • Security: Fix Denial of Service via HTTP/2 CONTINUATION Frames by @​kelunik

References

  • https://github.com/amphp/http/security/advisories/GHSA-qjfw-cvjf-f4fm
  • https://kb.cert.org/vuls/id/421644

Full Changelog: https://github.com/amphp/http/compare/v1.7.2...v1.7.3

1.7.2

What's Changed

  • Make implicit nullable types explicit by @​nicolas-grekas in amphp/http#28

Full Changelog: https://github.com/amphp/http/compare/v1.7.1...v1.7.2

1.7.1

  • Fixed header validation regex to allow names containing *, +, and . (#19)

1.7.0

  • Expose frame and byte count metrics in Http2Parser
  • Reduce strtolower calls, improving performance
  • Relax parsing strictness for request cookies to ignore empty trailing semicolons (amphp/http#18)
Commits
  • 3a33e68 Merge pull request from GHSA-qjfw-cvjf-f4fm
  • 68c61d2 Use older version of php-cs-config
  • 4d21ac9 Make implicit nullable types explicit (#28)
  • 0d729b0 fix validate header with dot (#19)
  • b654546 Extend check to discard empty request cookies (#18)
  • 2437d31 Add check to discard empty request cookies (#18)
  • 9e429aa Reduce strtolower calls
  • 5006170 Move ini values to setup step
  • 5043560 Fix passing flags to PHP instead of phpunit
  • 3ec9cf7 Enable exceptions for assertions
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=amphp/http&package-manager=composer&previous-version=1.6.3&new-version=1.7.3)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) You can disable automated security fix PRs for this repo from the [Security Alerts page](https://github.com/cspray/annotated-container-amp-http-server-demo/network/alerts).

Bumps [amphp/http](https://github.com/amphp/http) from 2.1.0 to 2.1.1.
- [Release notes](https://github.com/amphp/http/releases)
- [Commits](https://github.com/amphp/http/compare/v2.1.0...v2.1.1)

---
updated-dependencies:
- dependency-name: amphp/http
  dependency-type: direct:production
...

Signed-off-by: dependabot[bot] <support@github.com>

Merge pull request #20 from cspray/dependabot/composer/amphp/http-2.1.1

Bump amphp/http from 2.1.0 to 2.1.1

issue.title: Drop support for amphp/http-server 1.x
issue.body: This library does not aim to provide backwards compatibility for all amp versions. We aim to support the latest major release. The reasoning for this is simple: I do not have the time to allow for maintenance of many major versions across all of the labrador kennel repos and it is easier to consistently support the latest releases instead of having different rules for each repo.

comment.body: This was handled in #35 and will be released with the 1.0 tag.

issue.title: Drop support for amphp/http-server 1.x

The reasoning for this is simple: I do not have the time to allow for maintenance of many major versions across all of the labrador kennel repos and it is easier to consistently support the latest releases instead of having different rules for each repo.

issue.title: Update docs to reflect latest changes
issue.body:
- [ ] Update to latest labrador-kennel.github.io to ensure new syntax highlighting is used
- [ ] Move examples in gists to in-documentation to reduce burden on reading docs in-repo.

pull_request.body: This pull request does not change anything in the code logic, it just uses the new php 8.0 feature, [Constructor property promotion](https://www.php.net/releases/8.0/en.php#constructor-property-promotion)

issue.title: License missing
issue.body:
This package does not contain a licence which is a problem for reusing it.

Please provide a license!

_Also please make a release!_

comment.body:
Hi!

There is a `LICENSE` file present, https://github.com/labrador-kennel/http-cors/blob/main/LICENSE. I'm wondering where else you might be looking for this information to appear?

I will cut a new release for the PHP8 work you've done once I get the README and this issue sorted out. Sorry for the long delay.
